Frank Martin, Software Engineer

Since 2009 I’ve been working as lead engineer and mentor at a web development agency in Hertfordshire…

I’ve worked on an enormous number of websites & mobile applications most of which aren’t publicly available… But some are including Dentistry.co.uk, Dentistry on Demand, Law Manager & Tweet Show.

Every day I build and maintain apps with PHP/JavaScript using Angular/Laravel with Git/GitLab for source control and Ansible for deployment.
